actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the Rotunda of the Capitol to be used for a ceremony on November 16, 1983, commemorating the Twentieth anniversary of the death of President John Fitzgerald Kennedy.

summary.text: Authorizes the use of the Rotunda of the United States Capitol on November 16, 1983, to commemorate the 20th anniversary of the death of President John Fitzgerald Kennedy.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the Rotunda of the Capitol to be used for a ceremony on November 16, 1983, commemorating the Twentieth anniversary of the death of President John Fitzgerald Kennedy.
